html:
11.5.18  9:25 pm   What's the coolest word you can think of?

     alizarin crimson

11.5.18  8:01 pm   could we have the letters to the new song so we could unscramble them?

     

11.5.18  8:00 pm   what law should we have like right now

     sounds like we need a law telling us what laws to have

11.5.18  7:36 pm   Is your videos what goes through your head every day? (This is a serious question)

     the upcoming one, because i would be working on it

11.5.18  7:31 pm   You said that you once considered experimenting with other tuning systems but then quickly decided against it for good. Is it because of your perfect pitch?

     no

      Has your perfect pitch ever gotten in your way?

     no

11.5.18  6:21 pm   Do i deserve love?

     yes

11.5.18  5:52 pm   In order to learn producing, would you recommend starting off with covers or should I dive straight into recording self-written stuff (which is what I ultimately want to do)? Cover songs have the advantage of having something I can reference and compare to, while original stuff is probably more rewarding but also daunting.

     you'll have to make the choice

11.5.18  5:26 pm   you have recently started using a green screen to put yourself in videos, but you still sometimes put the whole videos in small boxes. what is this for?

     organization

11.5.18  5:26 pm   What is your character arc?

     it's a #7

11.5.18  5:22 pm   Hey bill, are your songs "And the day goes on" and "long long long journey" connected?

     no

     I feel like they have similar composition and they're even in the same key signature (F# I believe) and it just seems like a thing you'd do

     i try to avoid it. got a lot of songs to make, and it would be nice if they could all be as different as possible

11.5.18  4:48 pm   can you make a song without music?

     no

11.5.18  4:27 pm   was there a secret "fuck" in printfail?

     yes, i actually didn't notice it until now

11.5.18  4:13 pm   What do you want to accomplish in the future?

     be king, maybe queen also

11.5.18  3:47 pm   Do you ever perform live in front of a studio audience?

     no but perhaps i should

11.5.18  1:22 pm   If given the opportunity, would you run for president?

     no

11.5.18  12:59 pm   What's inside a fragile box from the unboxing video that you havent opened? i had nightmares because of it

     instructions for how to open the box

11.5.18  11:36 am   your music inspires me and I want you to know that also my question is is there any specific thing you do to spark creativity or does it just happen?

     moving, and stopping moving. those both work

11.5.18  11:29 am   When can we expect Triangle Boy: The Movie

     canceled, due to hatred

11.5.18  10:41 am   Why is this page so long

     that could be due to all the questions

11.5.18  9:42 am   What is one thing people should think about more ?

     it depends what they already think about

11.5.18  9:39 am   have i ever had an original idea in my life?

     yes

      have you?

     yes

11.5.18  9:18 am   Is Turn It On Again by Genesis written in 6/8 and then 7/8, or 13/16?

     neither, i think by any reasonable assessment those are quarter notes. so either 6/4 + 7/4, or 13/4. and as for which, you'd have to ask them but if it were me i'd prefer 6/4 + 7/4 so your bars are a slightly more reasonable size

      Also, would you ever do any crazy-nuts time sigs like that? I know you have in the past, but like, again, would you do it?

     whatever gets the job done

11.5.18  9:17 am   make more snogs

     ok

11.5.18  8:57 am   Have you ever recorded something at a specific time of day in order to hit a certain note? For example early in the morning in order to hit a deep note you couldn't hit later in the day?

     i probably took care of 'sun is a deadly lazer' early in the morning

11.5.18  8:39 am   What happened to notes?

     should be on the notes page

11.5.18  8:20 am   Would you consider making an acapella song?

     yes

      I'd be particularly interested in how you would do the voice leading.

11.5.18  7:37 am   does your music read you?

     yes

11.5.18  6:59 am   How do I be funny?

     start explaining the world you live in

11.5.18  6:53 am   have you considered collaborating with yourself?

     i already do but it can be difficult

11.5.18  4:35 am   what are your thoughts on physical music formats (vinyl, cassettes, CDs, etc)?

     they are always round. if you think one of them is square, don't be fooled, open it up and you will find it is round inside

11.5.18  4:32 am   whih came first stories or emotions?

     emotions

11.5.18  3:12 am   outside of actual instruments, what pieces of musical equipment would you say were the biggest breakthrough in your creative process?

     music stand

11.5.18  2:42 am   In the video for your song "La de Da de Da de Da de Day Oh", is the slide that says "I ♥ Satan" a joke? 

     fiction

11.5.18  2:36 am   can i send you my resume to be one of your backup singers?

     i don't particularly like resumes but you can send me an email with any info / recordings you think is relevant

11.5.18  1:37 am   Should i buy a new pen?

     sure

      if so which color should it be?

     white

11.5.18  12:47 am   did you say you were gonna incorporate covers into your schedule of song releases?

     yes

      when is the first one coming?

     i wanted to do it for halloween but the process is more complicated than i thought to make sure i have all the proper clearance in place, especially if i'm gonna make a video for it too

     is it going to be difficult to choose what song to cover?

     somewhat but no more difficult than picking what original songs to do. the difficult thing at this point is figuring out which ones i'm allowed to do

11.5.18  12:01 am   How do you perform improv on the keyboard so well? I've tried and it ends up sounding like a mess.

      it may help to be trapped on the island for a while with the instrument, and have that as your only way to communicate

11.4.18  11:07 pm   do you think your audience is ok or would the general public of them be better a bit different

     i don't know who's whom. that's the interesting thing about posting things online is someone could see it and i don't know quite who they are. george bush might have seen it

11.4.18  10:50 pm   when is triangle boy the movie coming out?

     canceled due to hatred

11.4.18  10:48 pm   How does one go about finding their life's purpose?

     go on "What's My Purpose" and try to complete all the challenges and outwit your competitors and you win the prize which is a 25 year supply of purpose with no strings attached besides all the taxes

11.4.18  10:43 pm   do you feel like your creative process has helped you become more physically attractive?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.4.18  10:43 pm   I forgot to do a thing, what do?

     do it now?

11.4.18  10:41 pm   Will I turn out ok in the end?

     yes and along the way also

11.4.18  10:24 pm   do you think youve had any manic episodes

     it's an entire series

11.4.18  10:18 pm   In the question from 11.3.18 1:09 pm .
Why don't you just finish making it in early December and then use the schedule feature on YouTube to release it on 12/24 or 12/25?

     that would be pretty much the end of the christmas season. that's why most christmas material is usually released several weeks earlier than that, possibly in november or october, that way it can be enjoyed throughout the christmas season

11.4.18  10:14 pm   you're a beautiful human being. but to make this a question, what's for dinner tonight?

     a clam

11.4.18  10:04 pm   a lot of bands hate there most popular because of how popular it is, is this how you feel about history of the entire world I guess

     i think it's pretty good, i worked very very hard on it for a very very long time and made sure it was absolutely the best i could make it. however i don't entirely remember how it goes because i have not watched it since i finished it

11.4.18  9:35 pm   whats your favorite song you've made

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.4.18  9:10 pm   if you can live forever, you will continue making songs? 

     yes, and more

11.4.18  8:53 pm   should i try harder or stop trying so hard?

     simply adjust the goals to where you want them, and then try accordingly
